item.title: Pavna Industries Stock Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.23.92 Amidst Prolonged Downtrend
item.description: Pavna Industries, a player in the Auto Components & Equipments sector, has reached a new 52-week low of Rs.23.92, marking a significant decline amid a sustained downward trend. The stock has underperformed its sector and broader market indices, reflecting ongoing pressures on its financial performance and valuation metrics. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Sensex and Nifty Advance as Small Caps Lead Market Rally; IT Sector Tops Gains
item.description: The Indian equity markets witnessed a broad-based rally on 22 December 2025, with the Sensex and Nifty indices registering gains amid positive global cues and robust domestic buying. Small caps outperformed other segments, while the IT sector emerged as the top sectoral gainer. Market breadth remained healthy, supported by strong foreign institutional investor (FII) and domestic institutional investor (DII) activity. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Garware Synthetics Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.16.15 Amid Market Pressure

The stock has experienced a sustained downward trend over the past week, reflecting ongoing challenges within the company’s trading and distribution sector. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Cupid Stock Surges 391.5% in Six Months, Outperforming FMCG Sector Benchmarks
item.description: Cupid has delivered an extraordinary return of 391.51% over the past six months, significantly outpacing the broader FMCG sector and market benchmarks. This remarkable performance highlights the stock’s strong momentum amid a challenging market environment, driven by a combination of bullish technical indicators and robust financial fundamentals. Time: 2 hours ago
